explanation: [0-0] A soccer player in a white and red jersey is on the field. In the background, a goalkeeper in a green jersey can be seen with a soccer ball in front of him, and spectators are sitting on the sidelines. There are two lines of black subtitles at the top that read "Tiki Taka Play Incoming" and a sighing emoji.

[0-5] The ball then rolls towards the goalkeeper. Player number 15 begins to slowly retreat. After the goalkeeper stops the ball, he passes it to player number 15. After receiving the pass, player number 15 gestures with his left hand to signal his teammate to receive the ball and then passes it.

[5-12] Finally, the subtitles at the top change to "One Touch + Nutmeg" along with a peanut and a surprised emoji. After player number 42 receives the ball, through tacit cooperation with teammate number 3, they kick the ball between the defender's legs. Then, through the precise change of direction by teammate number 22, they run around the defenders to regain possession, successfully moving the ball close to the two defenders of the opposing team. Subsequently, the player wearing the number 42 jersey accelerates with the ball, then shakes off the opponent who speeds up to catch up with him.
